item.title: How to set up Angular and Webpack in Visual Studio with ASP.NET Core
item.description: With this blog post I want to show an example of how to set up Angular and Webpack in Visual Studio with ASP.NET Core ready for dev and production builds. See also my latest article Angular Ahead Of Time (AoT) compilation, lazy loading and treeshaking with webpack If you read this until the end you will have a picture how to enable webpack and webpack-dev-server with npm and how to use webpack to bundle your angular application and inject files into index.
